cause.description:
Welcome all to our cause.. Our mission is to help all children who had loose their parents in war 1975...2006..We all have parents and if we had loose our parents too we are adult to be strong but these child who dont have anybody to help them to live they Need us so much!!....So if you have a good heart you should help Us and help our company ,,You can donate us in only 1 dollar or 1000 L.L to help these child to buy for them food!clothes!games!and for entering them school...! Be a helper!We need your help! Thank you...
1. children should eat!
2. children should go to school!
3. children should wear!
cause.name: orphelin
